SamPy.image.manipulationÂ¶

Basic image manipulation algorithms such as Gaussian smoothing and free rebinning.

requires:NumPy
requires:SciPy
author:Sami-Matias Niemi
contact:sniemi@unc.edu
version:0.1

Functions

blurImage(im, n[, ny]) blurs the image by convolving with a gaussian kernel of typical
congrid(a, newdims[, method, centre, minusone]) Arbitrary resampling of source array to new dimension sizes.
frebin(image, nsout[, nlout, total]) Shrink or expand the size of an array an arbitary amount using interpolation.
gaussianKernel(size[, sizey]) Returns a normalized 2D gauss kernel array for convolutions.
rebin(a, *args) rebin ndarray data into a smaller ndarray of the same rank whose dimensions
rebinFactor(a, newshape)
